```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(shiny)
library(tidyverse)
library(shinydashboard)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
```
```{r}
converted <- read_csv("data/acs_data_converted.csv")
View()
```
```{r}
converted %>%
            filter(dropDownMain == "Education") %>% 
            ggplot(aes(x = xValue, y = yValue)) +
            geom_bar(stat = 'Identity')
```

```{r}
edu_bar_plotly <- 
converted %>%
            filter(dropDownMain == "Education") %>%
            filter(xValue != "NA") %>%
            filter(is.na(xValue) == FALSE) %>%
            drop_na(xValue)
```


```{r}
edu_bar_plotly %>%
  filter(dropDownMain == "Education") %>%
  filter(xValue != "NA") %>%
  filter(!is.na(xValue)) %>%
  mutate(xValue = factor(xValue, levels = c('Less than 9th grade', '9th to 12th grade, no diploma', 'High school graduate (includes equivalency)', 'Some college, no degree', "Bachelor's degree", 'Graduate or professional degree'))) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = xValue, y = yValue, na.rm = TRUE)) +
  geom_col() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = 1, hjust=1))
```
